metadata.description: Antarctic's own maven of mechanized myths, Rod Espinosa, unleashes another spectacular steampunked story that'll give you chills!  A young boy's love and joy are deadened when a foreign substance invades his body, leaving him vulnerable to capture by the coldly beautiful Snow Queen.  His sweetheart must muster all the help she can find, hoping the fires of her affection and the steam powering her quest are enough to save her dear friend.
metadata.name: Rod Espinosa's Steampunk Snow Queen
